column1: A short description of the products offered
column2: A short description of the products offered

column1: The PocketBook company ranks fourth in the world among the manufacturers of premium e-book readers based on e-ink ("electronic paper") as well as multimedia readers and tablet computers running the Android operating system.
column2: The PocketBook company ranks fourth in the world among the manufacturers of premium e-book readers based on e-ink ("electronic paper") as well as multimedia readers and tablet computers running the Android operating system.

column1: Founded in 2007, PocketBook is headquartered in Lugano, Switzerland and sells its products in 32 countries worldwide.
column2: Founded in 2007, PocketBook is headquartered in Lugano, Switzerland and sells its products in 32 countries worldwide.

column1: The well-rehearsed team of PocketBook employees guarantees the high quality and exclusivity of the products, offers perfection down to the smallest detail and always meets all the requirements that customers place on modern reading.
column2: The well-rehearsed team of PocketBook employees guarantees the high quality and exclusivity of the products, offers perfection down to the smallest detail and always meets all the requirements that customers place on modern reading.

column1: In an effort to provide customers with the best products, the company has built several business units focused on developing and maintaining the equipment, developing unique reader software, and building an online platform to conveniently search for the best electronic content are.
column2: In an effort to provide customers with the best products, the company has built several business units focused on developing and maintaining the equipment, developing unique reader software, and building an online platform to conveniently search for the best electronic content are.

column1: The company occupies a leading position in the market and offers excellent customer service. Last but not least, the 130 PocketBook service centers distributed throughout the globe ensure this. Comprehensive warranty commitments beyond the legal requirements, the company understands as part of its corporate philosophy.
column2: The company occupies a leading position in the market and offers excellent customer service. Last but not least, the 130 PocketBook service centers distributed throughout the globe ensure this. Comprehensive warranty commitments beyond the legal requirements, the company understands as part of its corporate philosophy.

column1: In relation to the clearly defined mission of the company, the company PocketBook - in addition to its core business - is pursuing three ambitious projects aimed at promoting reading. For example, the e-book provider offers "BookLand", a company-owned electronic content store, "ReadRate" a search and referral service, those who enjoy reading, and "KidRead", a unique software for children To inspire reading. At the same time, this program helps the young readership to continuously study and constantly review literary knowledge.
column2: In relation to the clearly defined mission of the company, the company PocketBook - in addition to its core business - is pursuing three ambitious projects aimed at promoting reading. For example, the e-book provider offers "BookLand", a company-owned electronic content store, "ReadRate" a search and referral service, those who enjoy reading, and "KidRead", a unique software for children To inspire reading. At the same time, this program helps the young readership to continuously study and constantly review literary knowledge.

column1: To date, the company has presented more than 30 models of e-ink readers and multimedia tablets on the world market. The big part The majority of the products can be understood as innovative innovations in the field of electronic readers, which receive regular awards. All in all, the company has so far received 10 globally respected prizes - including the acknowledged international "Red Dot Design Award".
column2: To date, the company has presented more than 30 models of e-ink readers and multimedia tablets on the world market. The big part The majority of the products can be understood as innovative innovations in the field of electronic readers, which receive regular awards. All in all, the company has so far received 10 globally respected prizes - including the acknowledged international "Red Dot Design Award".

column2: What kind of memory card does the device support?

column1: The device supports the cards in micro SD format. Maximum storage capacity is 32 GB, optimal speed class is from 2 to 10. Please be careful when inserting the card that the card enters the slot, as shown in the full version of the user manual. Please insert the card when the device is turned off and disconnected from the PC.
column2: The device supports the cards in micro SD format. Maximum storage capacity is 32 GB, optimal speed class is from 2 to 10. Please be careful when inserting the card that the card enters the slot, as shown in the full version of the user manual. Please insert the card when the device is turned off and disconnected from the PC.
